description: Schema for storing and using individual data
title: Individual

___proband.description: Whether or not associated with a proband variant to a family
___proband.title: Proband

___countryOfOrigin.description: Country in which the family original live
___countryOfOrigin.title: Country Of Origin

___variants.description: List of variant(s) associated to the individual
___variants.title: Variant Associated

items.description: List of variant ids, see variant.json for detials
items.title: Variant

___maternityPaternityConfirmed.title: If de novo, is it maternity and paternity confirmed?

___specificMutationsGenotypedMethod.description: Method by which specific mutations genotyped
___specificMutationsGenotypedMethod.title: Specific Mutations Genotyped Method

___active.description: boolean switch to set if the individual avaliable for curation.

___hpoIdInElimination.description: List of HPO IDs eliminated from the disease
___hpoIdInElimination.title: HPO ID(s) Eliminated

___probandIs.description: Selection for semidominant MOI only, under Individual- Associate Variant
___probandIs.title: The proband is:

___bothVariantsInTrans.title: Is the 2nd variant located in trans with the 1st one?

___additionalInformation.description: List of Additional information for the individual
___additionalInformation.title: Additional Information

___scores.description: List of scores for this individual
___scores.title: Scores

items.description: Score assigned by user. Limited to one per user
items.title: Score

___hpoIdInDiagnosis.description: List of HPO ID for the disease
___hpoIdInDiagnosis.title: HPO ID(s)

___race.title: Race
enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

___otherPMIDs.description: List of other PMIDs having evidence about the individual
___otherPMIDs.title: Other PMIDs

___affiliation.description: The affiliation this evidence is associated with.
___affiliation.title: Affiliation

___label.description: An user entered label for individual
___label.title: Label

___denovo.title: Does associated variant cause de novo in individual?

___diagnosis.description: List of ontology IDs to diagnosis
___diagnosis.title: Diagnosis

___termsInElimination.description: Non-HPO terms (separated by comma) eliminated from the disease
___termsInElimination.title: Non-HPO term(s) Eliminated

___termsInDiagnosis.description: Non-HPO terms (separated by comma) for the disease
___termsInDiagnosis.title: Non-HPO term(s)

___assessments.description: List of assessments added from different curators
___assessments.title: Assessments
